description:
Expand your adventure with the "Pets Pack" DLC for Super Dungeon Maker! This delightful package adds five unique fantasy creatures to your game that will follow you through your dungeon explorations. These adorable creatures enrich your journey with their company and give each dungeon a personal and lively touch.

Prepare to enhance your dungeon experiences with these fascinating new companions. Download the Pets Pack and make your adventure even more magical!
name: Super Dungeon Maker - Pets Pack
